name: What's the Password?
description:
A login system asks for 10 random characters from a password. For example, "What are the 2nd, 6th, 23rd, .... characters?" The characters are always asked in the order that they appear in the password. {{url_for("Logins.txt", display="Here")}} is a list of 250 successful logins for an account. Find the shortest possible password that could fulfill all these logins.
Note: Flag not in LASACTF{} format
hints: Brute force is a bad idea
author: Wilson
